mapper.select:
select DISTINCT air.id from airport_service air left join flight_info fi on air.flight_id = fi.id left join airport_shuttle airs on air.id = airs.airport_id where air.data_status = '1'
and air.flight_num like concat('%', #{airport.flightNum}, '%')
--> and DATE_FORMAT(air.service_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{airport.serviceStartTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(air.service_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{airport.serviceEndTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and fi.flight_status = #{airport.flightStatus}
and airs.shuttle_id in
#{item}

select air.*, fi.flight_status as flightStatus, (select group_concat(airs.shuttle_id) from airport_shuttle airs where air.id = airs.airport_id) as shuttleIds, (select group_concat(airh.hotel_id) from airport_hotel airh where air.id = airh.airport_id) as hotelIds from airport_service air left join flight_info fi on air.flight_id = fi.id where air.data_status = '1' and air.id in
#{id}
